meanings.definition: In a habitual manner; regularly or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: She habitually brushes her teeth every morning.
meanings.sent2: He habitually takes a walk after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat habitually naps in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The old clock habitually chimed at noon, a comforting sound.
meanings.sent5: The student habitually arrives early to class, eager to learn.

meanings.definition: Done or practiced as a habit or custom.
meanings.sent1: The habitually late student missed the bus again.
meanings.sent2: She is a habitually organized person, always planning ahead.
meanings.sent3: The habitually messy desk finally got cleaned up, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His habitually cheerful attitude brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The habitually punctual train arrived right on time, as expected.
